entry.title: Introducing my new project, Shoot n' Grab
entry.summary: INTRODUCING.... Shoot n' Grab! Shoot n' Grab is a unity game I am going to start developing, where you well... Shoot n' Grab. This game will be a high paced fighting game where you fight npcs (and maybe people in the future), while grabbing stuff and…
entry.content:
INTRODUCING.... Shoot n' Grab!

Shoot n' Grab is a unity game I am going to start developing, where you well... Shoot n' Grab. This game will be a high paced fighting game where you fight npcs (and maybe people in the future), while grabbing stuff and using it to your advantage. You start off with a gun, and you can grab items to improve your gun and cause chaos..


When will this game be released?

Not in 2025, thats for sure. The discord for the game is at the end of the blog post, if you want updates.



Will you add updates to game progress on your blog?

Yuuup.





That's All!

See you later folks. I'll update you soon, and heres the discord.

https://discord.gg/Pn2xFYCusD
